website_summaries.verdict: Well-made FPV goggles that are packed with features and extras. They also provide a comfortable fit and excellent image quality.
pros: Updated goggles with a built-in digital recorder that does a good job capturing clear images
Offer a decent fit, and can even be worn with glasses
Come with a removable sun shade and a nicely-made carry case
cons: Interface and menu could be better

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set of goggles for FPV racing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of goggles for anything FPV related. The opening fits over my glasses and lack of fresnel lens inside means that the image is really clear. The padding is soft and fits my face w/o any light leaking. The diversity screen can be removed and used externally if needed, that makes it really flexible. The menu system is intuitive with a small 5-way joystick at the back and it has DVR! The battery pack (not included) fits into a pocket on the strap behind your head. I would recommend this goggle to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best FPV headset that I have come across if you wear glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, battery on back of headset balances out the screen in front. If you wear glasses this is the best option that I have come across. It uses 2 signals for diversity and the controls for the screen work well. It uses a micro sd card to record your flights. Only negative thing is it uses a fatshark type battery connection to connect the battery to the headset. You can find these easily but the price is higher than most batteries of the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: *NO battery included*
customer_reviews.text: There is no battery included with these goggles so figure another $15-20 for a good 2S battery with XT60 connector. It doesn’t include a micro SD card or internal memory so that may be another expense. For those reasons I think the Viper is a bit overpriced. Aside from that these are good goggles with a very clear image, HDMI in, AV in and out, plus DVR capability. The channel/frequency menu is top notch and you can even save your favorite combos if you use more than one for racing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Blizofoz45

customer_reviews.title: FXT Viper
customer_reviews.text: IMHO these are the best goggles in this price range that you can get, especially for glasses wearers. I've been using mine for a month+ and they perform great! I wear progressive bifocal lenses, and I can see the screen without trouble. I particularly like the removable bottom light shield, and that is how I've used them since day one. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: terry V

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: These are my first and only FPV goggles. I have "sampled" some other box goggles and Fat Shark style. They are definitly better than any other box goggle I have tried, both in comfort and view. No eye strain. Very comfortable. If the smaller form factor of fat shark style goggles is what you want, spend the extra money. But if lower price is what you want, you can't go wrong with these. My only complaint is the case for these is kinda big and does not fit into my backpack with all my other gear.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Best Goggles for EVERYONE !!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST WAY TO VIEW FPV IN MY OPINION !! excellent picture,very comfortable (for a box style goggle) , the use of mirrors is very easy and non strenuous on your eyes (since it’s the reflection of the monitor) great range , dvr works well and easily ( though it is not the best quality video) . Also can double as a bench monitor. If you are in the market for “Cool looking goggles “ these are Not for you. IF YOU WANT THE BEST FLYING EXPERIENCE WITH NO EYE STRAIN/pain GREAT QUALITY PICTURE WITH OR WITHOUT GLASSES AND A COMFORTABLE AWESOME MONITOR AND GREAT RANGE BUY THESE GOGGLES !!!

customer_reviews.title: Huge screen feels immersive.
customer_reviews.text: Very clear picture, large screen is immersive, materials feel high quality, love that you can remove the screen to be used as a ride along for multiple people. Will be using this quite often!
customer_reviews.author: christopher davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so far
customer_reviews.text: Just had my first fpv experience. These goggles are comfortable and I could easily focus on the screen. I used a 2s 1350 mah battery for power and was able to fly 3 batteries through my um sport cub, could have flown 2 more. UI is easy and intuitive. I recorded the flights, but have not had a chance to watch them. From this experience I am super happy with them. I would recommend them. Just have to watch how long they last now.

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I wear glasses and these fit and feel very comfortable. The removable HD screen is very sharp. I can take it out and put it on the bench for testing or I can monitor/record a race. Very satisfied with this purchase!!

customer_reviews.text: This is my first FPV goggle and it's great. The image is clear, the wear is comfortable. The detachable screen is very convenient. It has all the features for getting into FPV. Oh, and great price also!

customer_reviews.title: Almost very good
customer_reviews.text: The velcro for the head straps was not glued properly. Had to sew them together, but with my arthritis this was very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: steve scott

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality is good - head straps are bad out of the box and have to be sewn
customer_reviews.text: Headset works,and it comes with a nice case... only bad thing was that they used glue for the velcro on the stretchy head straps...and mine arrived where all of the glue had let go, so I had to have the velcro parts sewn back onto the stretchy headband in order for the straps to actually hold and work. I also found that when you have the goggle inserts in, it can be hard to see the very bottom of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit with glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Nice build, I like the periscope model. I have serious glasses issues with goggles. These fit fantastic. But alas my script needs to change to adjust for the focal length. My focus spot is lower, bit of a head tilt to get that sweet spot. An older pair of glasses with a wider reading area worked better. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great set of goggles for anybody looking to get started.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of goggles for anybody looking to get started in FPV! Clear image, comfortable design, detachable screen is convenient for spectating. DVR, and Diversity RX built in, has all the features you would ever want! Great price for all the features you get. A+
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Best box goggles on the market
customer_reviews.text: Bought these specifically for my wife. Her prescription is too high to be made into inserts for another type of goggle such as the HDOs so this was the next best thing. She loves them they are easy to use and the XT60 makes it easy as they hook to every battery we own. The only downside we have fount to them is the focal distance. The screen feels so close to your face it’s hard to observe the whole screen at once. Easily the best box goggles we have tried to date and will be buying another set eventually
customer_reviews.author: steve johnson
